text: Rafael Leonardo Callejas Romero (14 November 1943 â€“ 4 April 2020) was a Honduran politician. He served as the President of Honduras from January 1990 to January 1994. He was a member of the National Party of Honduras (PNH). He was born in Tegucigalpa. Callejas was diagnosed with acute myeloid leukaemia in 2018. He died due to cardiac arrest caused by leukaemia on 4 April 2020 in Atlanta, Georgia, United States. He was 76. ==Related pages== *List of scientists from North America ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:Deaths from acute myeloid leukemia Category:Presidents of Honduras
title: Rafael Leonardo Callejas Romero
